content: the best part about this pattern is you can swap around the bride/groom to make groom/groom or bride/bride i do not like sewing pieces on my amigurumi so this pattern is designed with the littlest sewing possible for example the hat and body is one piece connect with me here 1 i do not charge for my patterns but if you would like to support my work you can tip me on venmo @thoseyellowthings 1 https //www flowcode com/page/thoseyellowthings
